definitions.definition: a viscous liquid derived from petroleum, especially for use as a fuel or lubricant.
examples: lubricant, lubrication, grease; Morecrude, crude oil, fuel oil, petroleum; informalblack gold; humorousTexas tea "make sure the car has enough oil"Morecrude, crude oil, fuel oil, petroleum; black gold; Texas tea make sure the car has enough oil

definitions.definition: any of various thick, viscous, typically flammable liquids that are insoluble in water but soluble in organic solvents and are obtained from animals or plants.
a liquid preparation used on the hair or skin as a cosmetic.
any of a group of natural esters of glycerol and various fatty acids that are liquid at room temperature.

synonyms: smear/cover/rub with oil; informallube "I'll oil that gate for you"
